
                            
                            <p> <br>  <br> 买了两个，打开一个试用了一下，吹了感觉很冷，室内温度16，评论区说风力很小，可能还没到夏天吧 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/09/165748yuaerl4aelfttzfh.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/09/165748yuaerl4aelfttzfh.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/09/165750ckqs2stnqlpwsxlm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/09/165750ckqs2stnqlpwsxlm.jpg"> <br>  </p>
